title: Speak with Dead
content:
cription: Grant a semblance of life to a humanoid corpse, allowing it to answer up to 5 questions. Skeletons and creatures killed with Acid, Fire, Lightning, Necrotic, or Radiant damage no longer have a mouth and can't be made to talk using this spell. Doesn't work on Undead Level: Lvl 3 spell School: Necromancy School Casting Time: Action Range: 9m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: Ritual Spell: Yes
